item.title: Juko V2
item.description:
Table of Contents Introduction to Juko Juko V1: The Original Idea Juko Reimagined: Interactive Music Discovery Sessions
 a. Design: User Story + Figma
 b. Building: Django, React, Docker, GHA
 c. Deploying: GKE, Kubernetes, Kustomize
 Conclusion Appendix Introduction to Juko Juko started out as a “startup idea” after I graduated from college (Dec 2019) and was struggling to find work at the start of the pandemic (a.k.a. the pando). I use the quotes because I’m not sure I ever seriously believed this idea had the legs to become anything substantial.
